articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Numsa strike hits output at BMW plant - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Output at luxury carmaker BMW's main vehicle assembly plant in South Africa has been hit by a wage strike in the engineering sector by the country's biggest metalworkers union, a company spokesperson said on Monday.
